title: Fitoor
writer: Charles Dickens, Abhishek Kapoor, Supratik Sen
short_cast: Aditya Roy Kapur, Katrina Kaif, Tabu, Rahul Bhat, Lara Dutta, Akshay Oberoi, Aditi Rao Hydari, Ajay Devgn
cast: Aditya Roy Kapur, Katrina Kaif, Tabu, Rahul Bhat, Lara Dutta, Akshay Oberoi, Aditi Rao Hydari, Ajay Devgn
genre: Social Issue Dramas, Hindi-Language Movies, Movies Based on Books, Bollywood Movies, Dramas, Romantic Movies

desc: In this adaptation of Dickens' "Great Expectations," a young artist falls for an wealthy woman whose mother has trained her in the art of breaking hearts.
